item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.COMMIT() method saves the current record. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: This button on a form saves the current record:
This button on a form saves the current record in another form called Customer:
This button on a form saves the current record in an embedded browse (called Items):
